short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new GSLab extension allows you to capture your screen and share the Screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SkreenMe Chrome Extension allows you to share your screen and view it from different OS browsers simply by entering Access Code (Or Direct Access Link) at viewer's browser page
